music.musicNotPlayingDesc: To start playing something, use the `play` command
music.musicNoVoiceChannelTitle: You aren't connected to a voice channel!
music.musicNoVoiceChannelDesc: Join any voice channel & try again to start playing music
music.musicWrongVoiceChannelDesc: Join the voice channel where the bot is playing & try again
music.playResumeQueueDesc: To resume playback, use the `play`, `pause` or `resume` commands
music.playNoQueryDesc: Enter a song name/url from YouTube to start playing
music.playQueueFinishedDesc: No more tracks left to play
music.stopPlayingDesc: Stopped playback & disconnected from the voice channel
music.resumeNotPausedDesc: Music Playback has not been paused!
music.nextInvalidDesc: Use the `queue` command to find your track
music.playRepeatQueueDesc: Use the `repeat` command to change this
